    IdentityProviderApi.createIdentityProvider(IdentityProvider identityProvider)
    Create an Identity Provider Creates a new Identity Provider integration. #### SAML 2.0 Identity Provider You must first add the IdP's signature certificate to the IdP key store before you can add a SAML 2.0 IdP with a `kid` credential reference.
